name: Red Antler
tag_list: startups, branding, design, user-experience, web-design, mobile-design, strategy, research, naming, packaging, motion-graphics
overview:
Red Antler is a Brooklyn-based branding and design consultancy. The firm specializes in launching startups, new ventures, and offers brand re-positioning for more established and corporate clients. Core services include strategic planning, research, brand identity, messaging, print, packaging, web & mobile design and development, and motion graphics. Red Antler has shaped brands across a range of industries including, tech, b2b, education, entertainment, financial services, fashion & beauty, food & dining, hospitality, healthcare, lifestyle and more.

The company was co-founded in 2007 by JB Osborne, CEO, and Emily Heyward, Head of Strategy. Red Antler merged with Pro-Am, a graphic design studio, in 2010, with Simon Endres joining as a partner and Creative Director.

The company’s diverse clients include Behance, Tasting Table, One Kings Lane, Sugarpova, Rent The Runway, Sailthru, Vevo, NBC Universal, and Virgin.
